meanings.definition: Relating to the combined study of clinical and pathological aspects of a disease.
meanings.sent1: The clinicopathologic report provided a detailed analysis of the patient's condition.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on clinicopathologic information to make accurate diagnoses.
meanings.sent3: The clinicopathologic approach to understanding diseases can be quite enlightening.
meanings.sent4: Her clinicopathologic knowledge was like a flashlight in the dark, revealing hidden details.
meanings.sent5: The clinicopathologic perspective allows for a comprehensive view of health issues.

meanings.sent3: The clinicopathologic investigation turned into a fascinating puzzle-solving activity.
meanings.sent4: His clinicopathologic approach to problem-solving was methodical and effective.
